title: 7 años
description: Loyalties are tested and cruelties revealed when four business partners spend a tense evening debating who will pay for the crime they committed.
actors: Paco León, Juana Acosta, Juan Pablo Raba, Alex Brendemühl

title: 7 Chinese Brothers
description: An apathetic slacker sponging off his grandmother drifts into another dead-end job, unaware that a monster crush is about to change his life.
actors: Jason Schwartzman, Olympia Dukakis, Tunde Adebimpe, Eleanore Pienta

title: 7 Khoon Maaf
description: Spiced liberally with black comedy, this Bollywood drama follows the lethal love life of a woman who marries numerous men -- only to find them flawed.
actors: Priyanka Chopra, Neil Nitin Mukesh, John Abraham, Irrfan Khan
